welcome_message_body: Welcome to Katagami, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city known for its rich history, delicious local cuisine, and breathtaking nature. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Katagami has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akita Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Akita Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Odate Noshiro Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Odate Noshiro Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
